text: The Ruger AR-556 is a semi-automatic AR-15-style rifle made by U.S. firearms company Sturm, Ruger & Co. Made in 2014 as a AR-15-style rifle with a direct impingement with variants since being released such as the upgraded AR-556 MPR in 2017 and the AR-556 pistol in 2019. == References == == Other websites == * Ruger official website Category:Weapons Category:5.56 mm firearms Category:Rifles Category:Assault rifles
title: Ruger AR-556
